snippet: President Obama has supported Israel’s right to defend itself, but administration officials fear that escalating conflict could further damage the country’s fragile standing in the region.
abstract: Obama administration is increasingly concerned about escalating violence in Gaza, believing that ground incursion by Israel there could lead to increased civilian casualties, play into the hands of militant Palestinian group Hamas and inflict further damage to Israel’s standing in region at already tumultuous time.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has supported Israel’s right to defend itself, but administration officials fear that escalating conflict could further damage the country’s fragile standing in the region.

headline.seo: U.S. Fears a Ground War in Gaza Would Hurt Israel
headline.main: U.S. Fears a Ground War in Gaza Could Hurt Israel and Help Hamas
headline.print_headline: U.S. Fears a Ground War in Gaza Could Hurt Israel and Help Hamas
